titleStmt.title: Se defendendo. A shield, and shaft, against detraction. Opposed, and drawn, by Capt. George Wither, by occasion of scandalous rumours, touching his deserting of Farnham-Castle; and some other malicious aspersions.
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Thomason Coll.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
